comment._content: what makes you sure its a river ?    Looks like a dam to me.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] These GPO prints were 'identified' prior to transfer to State Records many years ago and we take on trust the accuracy of that identification. However we acknowlegde mistakes can be made and public forums like Flickr allow for images to be correctly identified. 

We always appreciate people identifying and dating photographs here, including any additional background info that adds to the 'story' of the photo. Providing verification of new info by including links in the comments helps. 

We would love to know where you think this photo was taken?

AB
